name: Eggerland 2
summary:
Find a hidden treasure in mazes of EDENERLAND. Clear each stage by answering puzzles which are given one after another. After clearing 100 stages of mazes with all your wisdom, then comes the final stage of glory. Can you find your way to this stage and save your dear LALA? 
* In addition tot the main 100 stages, you will also be challenged by special stages, Last stage and Back Stage. 
* When a stage is cleared, some exits will appear. If you go out through the wrong exit, you cannot go on to the next stage. 
* If you get through the map halfway, you can locate your position and can conquer each stage more easily.
